subject: Basketball
Uniforms
Awards, Decorations and Honors
Halls of Fame
lead_paragraph: Atlanta will retire Dikembe Mutombo’s No. 55 on Nov. 24, about two months after he is enshrined into the Naismith Memorial Basketball Hall of Fame.
snippet: Atlanta will retire Dikembe Mutombo’s No. 55 on Nov. 24, about two months after he is enshrined into the Naismith Memorial Basketball Hall of Fame.
